text: @GregAbbott_TX Why do STC admin staff need to go after successfully telecommuting from home when it’s closed til fall? Up to our supervisors...i have asthma and live with elderly was told no. People from harder hit areas of the valley are all coming here South Texas is screwed. #coronavirus https://t.co/fV03AkcXKY
